projects.title: MovieApp
projects.description: Welcome to our MovieApp! Powered by React.js, this platform showcases the latest films using real-time data from popular movie APIs. Explore, discover, and enjoy! :)

projects.title: NewsApp
projects.description: News App which displays articles from differnt API's based on user's selection and displays the full content of that article. I've learned a lot!
